Column.Name: HTML
Module Data
Image Map
Custom Link
Dark Mode
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
FALSE/*IF( $isMobile = TRUE, FALSE,
COALESCE(EBMS_GET_PREFERENCE("Dashboard Dark Mode"), FALSE) )*/

Column.Name: Icon Size
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
IF( $isMobile = TRUE, 2,
EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Vendor Accounts"), 3,
COALESCE( EBMS_GET_PREFERENCE("Dashboard Icon Size"), 2 ) )

Column.Name: Birthday Matches
Announcement Data
Announcement Attachments
Full Width
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
IF( $isMobile = TRUE, FALSE,
EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Vendor Accounts"), TRUE,
COALESCE( EBMS_GET_PREFERENCE("Full Width"), FALSE ) )

Column.Name: Company RecordID
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
LET $companyID := DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Vendor", "[Username] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER()) );
LET $companyID := COALESCE( $companyID, DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Vendor", "STEP TO CHILD [Contact]" & "ON [To].[Username] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER()) & "GET COUNT(0) >= 1" ) ); RETURN IFERROR($companyID, NULL())

Column.Name: Pending Approvals
Birthday Data
Voting Data
Column.Formula:
LET $data := DB_LOOKUP( ARRAY( "Topic ID", "Topic", "RecordID" ), "Voting Topic", DB_ENCODECONSTANT(NOW()) & " >= [Date Voting Open]" & " AND " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(NOW()) & " <= [Date Voting Closed]" );
RETURN HASH( "Topic ID", ARRAY_INDEX($data, 1), "Topic", ARRAY_INDEX($data, 2), "RecordID", ARRAY_INDEX($data, 3) )

Column.Name: Vote ID
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( AND([Cluster Admin Can Vote] <> TRUE, LEFT(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), 6) = "admin-"), "Cluster Admins accounts are not allowed to vote",
ISBLANK($thisValue), "Select an option" )

Column.Name: User Voted
Option Data
Column.DefaultValueFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("Option", "Option ID"), "Voting Topic", DB_ENCODECONSTANT(NOW()) & " >= [Date Voting Open]" & " AND " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(NOW()) & " <= [Date Voting Closed]" )

Column.Name: Result Data
User Vote
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Vote", "Vote", DB_ENCODECONSTANT(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER()) & " = [Originator]" & " AND [Topic ID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Topic ID]) & " AND [Vote] IS NOT EMPTY" )

Column.Name: New Option
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Vote ID] = "<Add New Option>", ISBLANK($thisValue) ), "Specify option" )

Column.Name: Custom Answers Enabled
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Custom Answers Enabled", "Voting Topic", DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Topic ID]) & " = [Topic ID]" ) = TRUE

Column.Name: Voting Attachments
Module Data - Mobile
Icon Data
Parent Structure

Label.Text: Attention System Builders!! Update Home page URL to point to Home form (records/Home/new?view=Default)

WebLink.Text: Click here to update the Home Page URL

Binding.Expression: AND( [Birthday Matches] = TRUE, DB_LOOKUP("Show Birthdays", "Global Settings", "[RecordID] = 1") = TRUE )
AND( DB_LOOKUP("Show announcements", "Global Settings", "[RecordID] = 1") = TRUE, [Announcement Data] <> NULL() )

Title.Text: What would you like to do today?

Binding.Expression:
LET $imageName := "Vendor"; LET $iconSize := [Icon Size]; LET $imageName := IF( $iconSize = 1, $imageName & ".png", $iconSize = 2, $imageName & "@2x.png", $iconSize = 3, $imageName & "@3x.png" ); LET $imageName := IF( $darkMode = TRUE, "trans-dark-" & $imageName, $darkMode <> TRUE, $imageName ); LET $image := [Icon Path] & $imageName; LET $style := "display: -webkit-inline-box;" & "width: " & $iconSize * 31 & "px;" & "height: " & $iconSize * 30 & "px;" & "background-image: url("" & $image & "");" & "background-position: center;" & "background-repeat: no-repeat;" & "background-color: " & "black" & ";"; RETURN "
" & "
" & "
"
AND( [Full Width] = TRUE, [Icon Size] = 3, EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Vendor Accounts") = TRUE, [Company RecordID] <> NULL() )

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_CONCAT( EACH target.[Option ID], [New Option ID] )
IF( [Vote ID] = "<Add New Option>", [New Option ID], [Vote ID] )

RefreshControl.Description: Refresh Chart (Relevant if a new option was added)

ChangeFieldValues.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Vote", "[Topic ID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Topic ID]) & " AND [Vote ID] IS NOT EMPTY" & " AND [Originator] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER()) )

Binding.Expression: "You have voted with the response: " & [User Vote]
AND( [Custom Link] <> NULL(), EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Administrators" ) = TRUE, $isMobile <> TRUE )
AND( [Custom Link] = NULL(), EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Administrators" ) = TRUE )

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: IF( [Full Width] = TRUE, 1, [Icon Size] = 1, 4, [Icon Size] = 2, 3, [Icon Size] = 3, 2, )

Title.Text: What would you like to do today?

Binding.Expression:
LET $imageName := "Vendor"; LET $iconSize := [Icon Size]; LET $imageName := IF( $iconSize = 1, $imageName & ".png", $iconSize = 2, $imageName & "@2x.png", $iconSize = 3, $imageName & "@3x.png" ); LET $imageName := IF( $darkMode = TRUE, "trans-dark-" & $imageName, $darkMode <> TRUE, $imageName ); LET $image := [Icon Path] & $imageName; LET $style := "display: -webkit-inline-box;" & "width: " & $iconSize * 31 & "px;" & "height: " & $iconSize * 30 & "px;" & "background-image: url("" & $image & "");" & "background-position: center;" & "background-repeat: no-repeat;" & "background-color: " & "black" & ";"; RETURN "
" & "
" & "
"
AND( [Icon Size] = 3, EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Vendor Accounts") = TRUE, [Company RecordID] <> NULL() )
